Hell if Know. probably not. NMB is getting forums stuff ready and such. It's been a while since we released anything so we are rusty

this is the 5 time I designed a RD-170 nozzle and this is by far the best and the quickest. What even is the spider that rides the nozzle....

Damn, your work looks top notch as always! All seems in place according to the specifications: http://lpre.de/energomash/RD-170/index.htm (I don't know if you use this site for the infos, but it has everything for some russian engines)
Is there any chance that we could just get a compatibility update, without any of the new stuff?
I can't wait for this!

Is there any chance that we could just get a compatibility update, without any of the new stuff?

Yeah that is what we are trying to do like I said. Rusty.

Yeah that is what we are trying to do like I said. Rusty.

For all this teasing, you deserve a job at Squad

Yeah that is what we are trying to do like I said. Rusty.

Sounds great
I can wait. I haven't seen anything yet.
Will the Balka solar panels still be included? I think those are the most important parts for me. Mainly because of their shape and output.

Will the Balka solar panels still be included? I think those are the most important parts for me. Mainly because of their shape and output.

I can't imagine why they wouldn't. I am not part of the dev team in anyway but I would say people might riot of those panels aren't included.

Hmm. IDK.. they are a little buggy.....

How do you all feel aobut the 1.25 Meter engines square mounts? Would you have perfered that they were round?

Hmm. IDK.. they are a little buggy.....

How do you all feel aobut the 1.25 Meter engines square mounts? Would you have perfered that they were round?

Don't even tease!!! Those are the most important part of the pack!

Seriously. Square or Round brackets for RD-170 family lol.

Teasing? Nah

Hmm. IDK.. they are a little buggy.....

How do you all feel aobut the 1.25 Meter engines square mounts? Would you have perfered that they were round?

I like the square mounts, they make your engines unique. I wouldn't complain if they were round, as they would fit on more tank types (even if I don't see why use other tanks, *wink*), plus thanks to the MODEL{} system we can add the square bottom assembly to other tanks too with little efforts, I think.

If you really feel creative, you could re-make the engines with a "main" mesh and multiple "adapter" meshes combined with MODEL, and switch them with the *redacted*, if MOARdv implements that function.

(Also about the panels, since people want them so much, you can include a notice about their buggines in the description)

EDIT: damn you ninja If you're asking the mount for the RD-170, keep it consistent please. Squared if you mean to leave the old one squared.

Edited November 10, 2014 by Sage
gotta go fast

Seriously. Square or Round brackets for RD-170 family lol.

Teasing? Nah

http://i.imgur.com/2cINkvz.jpg

It's beautiful....

When it comes to the engine that is entirely up to you! Square would def make your engines unique but I feel the roun make them fit better. Either way would be awesome.
Alright Release it NAO!!!! or Else!!!!

Outstanding issues list now very small
Dang, I forgot how good the texture of those panels are!
Wow, I missed out on the old KOSMOS, but these look great. Do they have IVA's?

Don't get me wrong, those look really nice. But... I see no parts that are actually new. Even that big station could, IIRC, be built with the old KOSMOS. Are there any new addition you're just keeping hidden?

As for the mounts, square look good.

Don't get me wrong, those look really nice. But... I see no parts that are actually new. Even that big station could, IIRC, be built with the old KOSMOS. Are there any new addition you're just keeping hidden?

As for the mounts, square look good.

CBBP just said that the first relase will be a compatibility update, so probably not. They might slip in a surprise, but don't count on it.

Wow, I missed out on the old KOSMOS, but these look great. Do they have IVA's?

The VA command pod has an IVA. The other parts do not. They don't have hatches either, so you'll have to use Crew Manifest to move crew to them - IIRC, the stock crew transfer thingy requires hatches to be present on both parts, although I'm not certain.
Is it possible to put Bobcats Mir IVAs into the components?
to be honest IVAs sort of he reason I don't work on SSPP much. IVas consume so much time and are utterly pointless. and Stocks crew transfer method is just... dumb...
